job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pModis is currently looking for a Data Scientist for a exciting opportunity with a top Automotive company You will be working with large data sets and doing heavy modeling The ideal candidate would have of 3 years of data science experience have worked with customer insight analytics and has worked on new model development utilizing Python and RppnbspppstrongPOSITION DESCRIPTIONstrongnbspppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBuild largescale machinelearning modelspipelinesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMaintain and enhance operational models through their lifecycleppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDeveloping metrics and reports to monitor model accuracy and evaluate performanceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspTranslate complex quantitative analysis into business insightsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspCollect data perform statistical analysis and present solutions to Product Ownersbusiness customersppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWorks hands on with tools such as Python R and SQLppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDefine and create the next generation of data solutionsppnbspppstrongTECHNICAL SKILLS DESIREDstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp3  5 years of Data Science experiencenbspppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPredictive ModellingppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStatistical analysisppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPythonppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspRppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspSQLppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBachelors degree in mathematics data science statistics or computer scienceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with GCP is a plusppnbspppstrongADDITIONAL INFORMATIONstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExcellent compensation packages including Subsidized Medical Benefits Paid Time Off and 401kppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspNo ThirdParty inquiriesp
